data.title: Introduction
description: You are a retired high class theif who has done many heists in the past. However recently you recieved an anonymous tip about a flaw in the security of the Balmoral Casino. Seeing the immense fortune that could be made you decide to put on the mask once more and do one final heist to end your career.

Stealth is representative of the skill of the crew. A high stealth value will ensure that the heist goes through successfully (Keep as high as possible)
Loyalty is representative of how loyal your crew is. A loyal crew will follow your orders and lead to a successful heist (Keep as high as possible)
Overall, maximise the DSL value for a successful heist.
